title: Hack for Sweden
description: Winner of both the Special Jury Prize and Participants Prize with Will & Skill for WarnBox, a smart-home device designed like a smoke alarm that automatically reads out emergency alerts (VMA messages) from SMHI and krisinformation.se. Built with Raspberry Pi and 3G connectivity, using Python and a text-to-speech API, to ensure households receive critical warnings about storms, hazardous situations, or emergencies, even without an active media connection or smartphone.

title: The Nordea Innovation Challenge
description: Winner of Best Mobile Application at this 48-hour hackathon themed "Banking on the Future" in Stockholm. Delivered an OCR receipt solution with Will & Skill that lets customers scan receipts at purchase, automatically extract product information, and build a searchable digital archive, giving users control over their financial documentation. Solution was judged by a jury from Nordea, IBM, and Apple.
